HowItWorkDetail: Discover how Lesoll can help you sell, buy or rent your future property!
SelectPropertyInfo: Find your ideal property by filtering your search and finding what you’re looking for exactly.
BookAppointmentDetail: Pick a date and time to schedule an appointment and visit yourpreferred property.
CloseDealInfo: Now, meet the owner and close the deal with him if both of you agree on conditions and terms.
AddPropInfo: You can add a new property by clicking on add property button at the top of the page or from here
AddDetail: Add all the details for your property and add high-quality photos to make it easier to be sold or rent.
AddAppointmentInfo: The last step in adding your property is to add your available appointments to meet the renter or buyer.
GalleryInfo: first image will be the main image
RealtyGoogleLocation: you can select map to specify location you want, and after clicking, you can write your add in your style
NoFaqs: There are no Questions or Answers
Stat1: Lesoll is an Egyptian online real estate marketplace. Lesoll offers customers a digital experience for buying, selling, and renting properties with end-to-end service. It facilitates owners, buyers, and renters to find the upcoming deal across Egypt through recommendations, and map overlays that offer details on commutes, schools, and nearby facilities.
MissionStat: To regulate and facilitate the real estate market by following the digital transformation rather than the traditional exercise. Also through rules and motivational mechanisms that preserve rights and create balance in the market with safe and accurate standards.
VisionStat: To become the main driver for developing and enhancing trust in the real estate market, which creates a balance between demand and supply and ensures sustainability and improvement in this sector.
FacilitationStat: Lesoll gives you full information about the chosen neighborhood so you can decide if that property and neighborhood are suitable for you.
KnowledgableStat: Knowledgeable: We strive to learn more about real estate market and users’ needs.
AspirationState: Lesoll aspires to be your first choice in the real estate industry, so we work hard to achieve your convenience.
PerfectionState: At Lesoll we strive to achieve perfection and cover all your needs in an easy way that fits your requirements.
ConnectionState: Lesoll finds the best and easiest ways to communicate owners with buyers or renters.
LoyaltyState: Lesoll gives its priority to users’ convenience, so we’ll be happy to receive advice and complaints.

Privacy1: Lesoll website is committed to protecting users’ privacy. We share this privacy with users for their information. Lesoll ensures that users’ information is protected, shared, processed, and used in a way that preserves their safety.
Privacy3: Users share some data with Lesoll while registering/signing in as follows:
Privacy4: When the user registers with his Google account:
Privacy5: first name, last name, and email address are shared with Lesoll.
Privacy6: When the user registers with his Facebook account:
Privacy7: the user shares his personal profile such as name, nickname, registered email address on his Facebook account, and other data like age, and gender.
Privacy8: When the user sign-up and create a new account on Lesoll website:
Privacy9: the user can provide his personal data such as name, email address, and phone number.
Privacy10: When the user uses Lesoll chat service:
Privacy11: The user has the choice to share the data with us.
Privacy13: we may receive some information because of users’ visits and use of the website. This information may include the geographical location date and time of visiting Lesoll website, and also include the length of time you spent on the website and your browsing history.
Privacy14: How do we process the data you provide?
Privacy15: Lesoll is committed to protecting your data and information legally and safely and to using it for legitimate and determined purposes only and abstaining from using it for any purpose not compatible with these purposes. Lesoll also is committed to updating data and information if necessary only.
Privacy16: How do we use your personal information?
Privacy17: We may use your personal information for the following purposes:
Privacy18: To improve the user experience on Lesoll website.
Privacy19: To provide you with a better service and improve our services either through your provided information or the complaints we receive from the website's support service.
Privacy20: It’s better to register your phone number on Lesoll website to facilitate communication between you and the property owner either through WhatsApp service or phone calls.
Privacy21: To provide you with more appropriate search results, and also provide more relevant content for what you search for on the website.
Privacy23: Lesoll is committed to keeping your used personal information secure and preventing access to it other than for authorized purposes, as well as committed to taking all necessary precautions and procedures to protect your information and not to disclose, change, destroy or use them in any illegal way. And in the case of creating a password for your account on Lesoll website, it is solely responsible for keeping its confidentiality. And in all cases, Lesoll is committed to making the best effort in protecting and securing your information permanently.
TitlePlaceholder: Example Good Realty in Good Place ....
Privacy25: The user has the right to request access to his information and receive a copy of it and update it. Also, user can delete their personal information on Lesoll website if it is not necessary. The user also has the right to make complaints to officials on Lesoll website, and Lesoll is committed to completely solving it to keep our users satisfaction.
CalendarConfirmStat: If you confirmed, Lesoll will have the authority to access your Google Calendar.
SearchInfo: To Identify Realty Exact Location Click On Address Location Next To Detail
